unnormalised: Crop insurance, eh? Useful thing, especially with unpredictable monsoons these days! Remember last Onam, Rajan's paddy field near Kochi was totally flooded. Thank god for the insurance! Heard the premiums are rising though. Hope it doesn't become like buying biryani at Rs. 500 a plate - unaffordable! Farmers in Haryana are also talking about PMFBY. Needs a good review, this scheme!
